articles.title: Ed Sheeran sings of trip to Antarctica on new single Afterglow nine months before daughter's birth - Daily Mail
articles.description: In the romantic track, which was released at 11am on Monday, the star sings about being: 'love drunk waiting on a miracle, trying to find ourselves in the winter snow.'
articles.content:
Ed Sheeran appears to reminisce about a trip to Antarctica with wife Cherry Seaborn nine months before their daughter Lyra Antarctica was born on new song Afterglow.
